Thanks. I recall this one from the 90's. Much better than Terrahawks.

As for sound on the Mac, try the 3IVX codec. It seems to handle all audio.

http://www.3ivx.com/

Works perfectly fine, thanks a lot for uploading this, i've not seen this since i was about 4 years old...this is all 24 episodes, although the order is a bit muddled up.
You NEED an audio codec to actually get some sound, i used AC3Filter. It's free, just google it.
Sound and picture quality is perfect. Brought back some great memories...
And damn that Simone Bendix (Officer Castle) is gorgeous...
I am stuck downloading episodes 13 & 21. Is anyone seeding this?
Thanks a Million, I had never even heard of this and thouroughly enjoyed it!!
